Hello lovely people of bookstagram üçì

I finished The Outsiders and‚Ä¶holy freaking crap it was amazing. 

Rating: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

The Outsiders is an amazing book. Barely even halfway through I already knew it was one of my favourite books. I freaking loved this book so much. 

The second I finished it I was so sad because it‚Äôs such a short book, but I think that‚Äôs what gives it character. I really really enjoyed it and I can understand why people love it so much. I think S.E Hinton really gave a great description of Ponyboy and how he felt to all the gang members, and just the book in general.

The best part is that I think everyone would like this book, given it‚Äôs length and great plot I just think that no matter if you like reading or don‚Äôt care for it, The Outsiders is an amazing book for anyone. 

S.E Hinton really did an amazing job with this book and I totally recommend it to literally anyone. I hope everyone has a great day!! Happy reading lovelies üíóüíó
